CustomField.formula: IF (OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Filing")), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Regenerate_Agreement&templateType=Agreement", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Regenerate", "Regenerate"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Regenerate
